name: ∀kashicforce
description: ∀kashicforce is a puzzle-game-like, rhythm-game-like game where you input commands to use moves like in a fighting game. The goal is to crush your opponent to a pulp with an immense amount of blocks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1/10 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5-3230(2.86GHz) or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 or higher, 1280x720 or higher display Storage: 2 GB available space
